data.title: Doctor Radio: Listen to Top Medical Experts
data.meta_description: Your chance to talk directly to some of the top doctors in the world. Powered by NYU Langone Health.
data.text:
Interventional Cardiology

Next Airs Tomorrow at 6 am

2 hrs

Dr. Fred Feit, an internationally-renowned interventional cardiologist, likes to accentuate the positive on his weekly progr …

Dr. Fred Feit, an internationally-renowned interventional cardiologist, likes to accentuate the positive on his weekly program Heart to Heart. You'll hear stories that will inspire you as well as make you laugh - and also take away the best medical information available on the radio. Dr. Feit and his team at Bellevue Hospital helped revolutionize the treatment of patients who suffer heart attacks, but for Fred it's not about his legendary technical skills. He loves treating the whole patient and not just the blocked artery in isolation.

Medical Grand Rounds

Next Airs Tomorrow at 8 am

2 hrs

We take you on the Hospital Grand Rounds to learn the latest in-depth research and advances for complicated medical conditio …

We take you on the Hospital Grand Rounds to learn the latest in-depth research and advances for complicated medical conditions.

Pediatrics: On Call For Kids

Next Airs Tomorrow at 10 am

2 hrs

Treating an infant, child or adolescent is not the same as treating a small adult. Our expert pediatricians tackle allergies …

Treating an infant, child or adolescent is not the same as treating a small adult. Our expert pediatricians tackle allergies, asthma, ear infections, childhood obesity and cuts and bruises as well as signs of autism, ADHD and other developmental issues.

The Otolaryngology Show

Next Airs Tomorrow at 12 pm

2 hrs

Join the doctors from the NYU Langone Medical Center's Otolaryngology Department as they cover topics affecting the health o …

Join the doctors from the NYU Langone Medical Center's Otolaryngology Department as they cover topics affecting the health of the ears, the nose, and throat.

Cardiac Surgery

Next Airs Tomorrow at 2 pm

2 hrs

Cardiac Surgeon Dr. Greg Ribakove takes you into the OR, describing the intricate surgeries he performs many times a week, f …

Cardiac Surgeon Dr. Greg Ribakove takes you into the OR, describing the intricate surgeries he performs many times a week, from the now-common bypass surgery, to the heroic efforts of saving the life of an accident or crime victim. You'll feel the adrenaline rush as they hold the life of a patient in his hands.

Men's Health

Next Airs Tomorrow at 6 pm

2 hrs

Men's Health explores in-depth a wide variety of general and sexual issues.

Men's Health explores in-depth a wide variety of general and sexual issues.

Sports Medicine

Next Airs Thursday at 6 am

2 hrs

Get back in the action with the help of our Sports Medicine hosts. From ligament strains and meniscus tears that happen on t …

Get back in the action with the help of our Sports Medicine hosts. From ligament strains and meniscus tears that happen on the field and in everyday life, get advice from the pro doctors who fix up pro athletes and get their world class advice about your own body.

Women's Health

Next Airs Thursday at 10 am

2 hrs

Host Dr. Caren Behar examines the health concerns specific to women and identifies the steps that can help women take charge …

Host Dr. Caren Behar examines the health concerns specific to women and identifies the steps that can help women take charge of their health and well-being.

Health Care Connect

Next Airs Thursday at 12 pm

2 hrs

Claims, co-pays, deductibles, networks, partial coverage, referrals--NYU Langone Medical Center's Andrew Rubin, Matt Penzine …

Claims, co-pays, deductibles, networks, partial coverage, referrals--NYU Langone Medical Center's Andrew Rubin, Matt Penziner, and Allison Vogel will guide you through the health care system and make it as simple as possible, discussing the latest news and rules, and answering your specific insurance questions.

Child Psychiatry/Psychology: About Our Kids

Next Airs Thursday at 3 pm

1 hr

Experts from the NYU Child Study Center discuss the essentials of child, teen and family mental health, from psychiatric and …

Experts from the NYU Child Study Center discuss the essentials of child, teen and family mental health, from psychiatric and learning disorders to self-esteem and school success. Visit www.aboutourkids.org/sirius

Chief's Rounds

Next Airs Thursday at 4 pm

2 hrs

Mark B. Pochapin, MD, discusses all things in health and wellness with today’s leaders. Tune in to hear the latest informati …

Mark B. Pochapin, MD, discusses all things in health and wellness with today’s leaders. Tune in to hear the latest information on preventive strategies, questions about symptoms, and treatment options for a difficult diagnosis-- straight from the experts who are leading the way in science, medicine, and patient care. Dr. Pochapin is vice chair of clinical affairs, director of the Division of Gastroenterology, and professor of gastroenterology in the Department of Medicine at NYU Langone Medical Center.

Dermatology

Next Airs Thursday at 6 pm

2 hrs

From laser therapy to Botox, more and more people have concerns about skin conditions and treatments. Call in to speak with …

From laser therapy to Botox, more and more people have concerns about skin conditions and treatments. Call in to speak with the experts and ask your questions on everything from acne and psoriasis to rosacea and hair loss.

Nutrition and Exercise

Next Airs Friday at 12 pm

2 hrs

It's not always easy to make smart diet & exercise choices. Registered dietician and exercise physiologist Samantha Heller w …

It's not always easy to make smart diet & exercise choices. Registered dietician and exercise physiologist Samantha Heller will offer tips and encouragement throughout the week.

Sexual Health

Next Airs Saturday at 12 am

2 hrs

Intimacy, desire, technique--no question is taboo for Dr. Virginia Sadock, one of America's most respected human sexuality e …

Intimacy, desire, technique--no question is taboo for Dr. Virginia Sadock, one of America's most respected human sexuality experts, and Dr. Miriam Greene, a leader in hysteroscopy. Through the anonymity of the telephone, you can finally talk about your fantasies, inhibitions, your partner's desires and your own.

Internal Medicine

Next Airs Saturday at 4 am

2 hrs

Weight loss, diet, exercise induced injuries and injury prevention - NYU Langone Health's Doctor Rabia De Latour covers all …

Weight loss, diet, exercise induced injuries and injury prevention - NYU Langone Health's Doctor Rabia De Latour covers all the latest trending topics related to medicine. Call in and ask your questions on everything from gut health and diets, to brain health, to aging.

Orthopedics

Next Airs Saturday at 6 am

2 hrs

Hand injuries and shoulder pain. Knee and hip surgery. Spine injury. Foot and ankle problems. Our Orthopedic doctors are on …

Hand injuries and shoulder pain. Knee and hip surgery. Spine injury. Foot and ankle problems. Our Orthopedic doctors are on call to help you with what ails your bones and joints.
